title: LF Bronze/Silver Ranked 5's
body:
Hi guys to all who may have hopelessly pondered here :P
I'm keen to join any ranked 5's mainly for fun and hopefully improve xD
I'm a mid main with an average KDA of 3.00
I also can play all roles to a moderate standard however, I do best with {{champion:157}} and assassin midlaners
If your interested pm me 
IGN: Turtlepower789 {Hoping to change this cancerous name}
Age: 16 
Bio: Name is Robin Attending high school (Year 11) whilst still perusing my gaming hobbies 
Pref Role: Mid 
Looking for: Ranked 5 team (Pref Fun team)
Rank: Bronze Almost Silver VERY SOON! :D {{item:2009}} 
That's all I guess :P

replies.body:
Hi :)
I'll add you and hopefully we can sort things out then

I'm currently in B3, I main mid and support. I can play jungle and top pretty well too (not so great with ADC but I can practice in norms/customs if needed). Looking for four others to climb to silver V at least, feel free to add me. ( ^ω^ ) ♥

Hey! xD
I'd be glad to add you 
Im hoping to achieve Silver V before season ends 
Private Message me for more info :)

Hey,

I was looking to form/find a team as well. I'll give you a link to my thread, let me know if you're interested!! 

Cheers,

Geoff

Hey thanks for the offer :)
I'd be glad to join/invite you, Im glad to see we have similar goals
I'll add you as soon as possible and yeah we'll see how things go from there xD

Hey guys thanks for letting me know there are some of you interested!
I'll add everyone that has posted here :)
Like i said before im not looking for any serious ranked teams so im happy to join any Bronze/Silver team 
and If you want to climb the ladder with me on Solo Q PM me I'd be happy to climb with someone on my team

~Im thinking of creating a ranked team of my own so if your interested don't hesitate to PM me or post :)
PM me we need one more laner to do promos.
